snippet: Joe Michaels, who has been the director for 18 years, was given a new job last week that portends more change to come.
abstract: NBC News is replacing longtime director of Today Joe Michaels in latest sign of top-to-bottom overhaul at morning show, which is trying to climb out of second-place ratings slot; Michaels moves to senior director, responsible for installation of new Today show set and graphics style, among other initiatives; network has yet to name new director.
lead_paragraph: Joe Michaels, who has been the director for 18 years, was given a new job last week that portends more change to come.

headline.main: In Overhaul, ‘Today’ Show Director Gets a New Title
headline.print_headline: In Overhaul, ‘Today’ Show Director Gets A New Title
